title: WATCH: Elmohamady's OG gaffe!
description: Aston Villa’s Ahmed Elmohamady scored with a lovely finish on Saturday afternoon – for the wrong team!
content:
The full-back was trying to clear the ball for his side following a corner, but somehow ended up managing to slam the ball into the top corner of his own net.
It was an own goal that halved Aston Villa's lead against Burton to 2-1 at Villa Park, but luckily for Elmohamady his side went on to win 3-2 and pick up three more vital points in their bid for promotion from the Sky Bet Championship.
Hit play on the video at the top of the page
